org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.facilities

Class Facility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.util.CloseableBase
        • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.util.CloserBase
          • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.facilities.Facility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Blade, Closeable, Closer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Plant

    public class Facility
extends CloserBase
    Provides a thread pool for non-blocking and isolation targetReactor. Multiple facilities with independent life cycles are also supported. (A ServiceClosedException may be thrown when messages cross facilities and the target facility is closed.) In addition, the facility maintains a set of AutoClosable objects that are closed when the facility is closed, as well as a table of properties.
